title: Install protected bike lanes on Lamar Blvd
description: Add protected bicycle lanes along Lamar Boulevard from downtown to North Austin to improve cyclist safety and encourage active transportation.

title: Pilot curbside composting in East Austin
description: Launch organic waste collection service in East Austin neighborhoods to reduce landfill waste and create compost for community gardens.

title: Extend library hours to 9 PM
description: Extend public library hours to 9 PM on weekdays for six-month trial to improve access for working families and students.

title: Install solar panels on 5 community centers
description: Install solar photovoltaic systems on five city community centers to reduce energy costs and demonstrate renewable energy commitment.

title: Start youth apprenticeship program
description: Create apprenticeship program in city maintenance and parks departments for youth aged 16-24 to provide job training and career pathways.

title: Pilot mobile mental health crisis response
description: Launch mobile mental health crisis response unit operating five days per week to provide immediate support and reduce police involvement.

title: Expand free Wi-Fi in public parks
description: Offer free Wi-Fi in all major public parks and recreation centers to improve digital access and reduce the digital divide.

title: Increase affordable housing trust fund
description: Increase the city's affordable housing trust fund by $50 million to support construction of 1,000 new affordable housing units.

title: Plant 1,000 street trees
description: Plant street trees along major transit corridors and in underserved neighborhoods to improve air quality and provide shade.

title: Install public water refill stations
description: Install 25 public water refill stations in parks, schools, and community centers to reduce plastic waste and promote hydration.

title: Launch participatory budgeting pilot
description: Allocate $2 million of the city budget for residents to vote on community projects in a participatory budgeting pilot program.

title: Pilot electric buses on Route 1
description: Deploy five electric buses on Capital Metro Route 1 to reduce emissions and noise pollution in the city center.

title: Create community garden network
description: Establish 10 new community gardens on city-owned vacant lots to provide fresh food access and educational opportunities.

title: Launch digital literacy program
description: Provide free digital literacy training and computer access at all public libraries to bridge the digital divide.

title: Improve pedestrian safety at 20 intersections
description: Install pedestrian countdown signals, improved crosswalks, and better lighting at 20 high-traffic intersections.

title: Expand rental assistance program
description: Increase rental assistance funding by $10 million to help 500 additional families avoid eviction and maintain stable housing.

title: Launch recycling education campaign
description: Implement citywide recycling education campaign to increase participation and reduce contamination in recycling streams.

title: Increase park maintenance funding
description: Increase park maintenance budget by $3 million to improve safety, cleanliness, and accessibility of all public parks.

title: Expand small business support program
description: Provide technical assistance and micro-loans to 200 small businesses, with priority for minority and women-owned businesses.

title: Reduce transit fares for low-income riders
description: Implement 50% fare reduction for low-income residents to improve access to public transportation and reduce transportation costs.

title: Expand emergency shelter capacity
description: Add 100 emergency shelter beds and improve facilities to better serve Austin's homeless population during extreme weather.
